item.title: REDtalks.live #47 - POSTMAN API client w/ creator & CEO, Abhinav Asthana
item.description: Very excited about today’s episode where I’m joined by Abhinav Ashtana, the creator and CEO of world renowned API client, POSTMAN. In this episode, hear Abhinav explain how POSTMAN started â€“ how a personal frustration with API interactions presented an opportunity to create something cool.
